meanings.definition: A person who believes in monism, the doctrine that reality is one unitary substance or principle.
meanings.sent1: The monist explained that everything in the universe is connected as one.
meanings.sent2: She is a dedicated monist, always seeking to understand the unity of all things.
meanings.sent3: The monist joked that even the different flavors of ice cream are just different aspects of the same delicious whole.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the monist, the river and the ocean are like siblings, both part of the vast family of water.
meanings.sent5: As a monist, he sees the world as a beautiful symphony of interconnected notes.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to monism or monists.
meanings.sent1: The monist philosophy promotes the idea of unity and interconnectedness.
meanings.sent2: Her monist beliefs influence her approach to art and nature.
meanings.sent3: The monist perspective on life can be quite refreshing in a world of divisions.
meanings.sent4: The monist view of the universe is like seeing a painting where all colors blend seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: In her monist interpretation, every living being is a unique expression of the same universal energy.
